attributes.action: Make it law that all dogs must have gentic & full health tests before breeding
attributes.additional_details:
We took on a pup at 8 weeks old. I spent 12 months fighting to get him tested, referred  and diagnosed.   
At the time when taking the dog on I wasnt totally aware on how much an impact genetic  diseases  would effect a dog.  
Our dog lost his life at 15 months old. 
We still didnt have a full diagnosis but it was genetics that played a part. 
He had a heart issue and he also had neurological  issues.   By making it a law that all testing must be done. We could stop dogs suffering. And families suffering
attributes.background:
To make it law that a person who intends to breed their dog. To make sure both parent dogs are genetically tested and fully health tested    
To reduce unwell dogs.  Stop the spread of genetic  diseases.
